long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
"Voice Conversation for AI" expands the capabilities of popular AI platforms by adding voice control and read-aloud features. This extension allows you to interact with multiple AIs seamlessly through voice, eliminating the need for typing. You can speak to AIs like ChatGPT, Mistral AI, Poe, and others in over 145 languages, making communication more accessible and engaging.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Advanced voice control for multiple popular AIs including ChatGPT, Mistral AI, Poe, and others.
‚Ä¢ Enables voice typing across all websites with customizable voice commands.
‚Ä¢ Extends AI with voice control, voice input, and multilanguage support.
‚Ä¢ Hear AI's responses in a natural voice with options to change the voice and language.
‚Ä¢ Adjustable speaking speed for AI responses (slow or fast).
‚Ä¢ Customizable message-sending options: Send messages automatically after speaking or manually.
‚Ä¢ Voice command to clear message input and customize your experience.
‚Ä¢ Automatic language detection for text-to-speech voice.
‚Ä¢ Read-aloud button for each message, allowing you to listen to responses again.
‚Ä¢ Highlighted sentence or phrase you're listening to, improving comprehension.
‚Ä¢ Real-time answers and voice conversations with seamless integration.
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable keyboard shortcuts for an optimized experience.
‚Ä¢ Supports over 145 languages, including English, Spanish, Mandarin, Russian, Hindi, and more.

With this extension, you can:
‚Ä¢ Speak to multiple AIs and hear responses in real-time.
‚Ä¢ Use voice commands to send messages, clear input, or perform other actions.
‚Ä¢ Interact with the AI in over 145 languages.
‚Ä¢ Customize your experience with different voices, speeds, and language options.

Whether you're looking for hands-free AI interaction or need a more natural way to engage, "Voice Conversation for AI" makes your experience more immersive and intuitive. This extension is perfect for users tired of typing and those who prefer to listen rather than read. The voice features are customizable, and the integration is seamless, providing a powerful voice interface across AI platforms.

long.en_GB:
This extension extends Google Bard with voice control and read-aloud features using advanced voice recognition and text-to-speech (TTS) technologies. Which allows you to have voice conversations with Google Bard in multiple languages. This extension helps you communicate with the AI without typing. You can send voice queries to the AI and listen to its responses with ease.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Extends Google Bard AI with voice control and voice input in multilanguage.
‚Ä¢ Hear the AI's response in a natural voice.
‚Ä¢ Ability to change Bard's voice (text-to-speech voice) and language.
‚Ä¢ Ability to adjust the AI's speaking speed to hear the response slowly or fast.
‚Ä¢ Customizable message-sending options (Send messages automatically after you finish speaking or when you use a custom voice command or manually).
‚Ä¢ Customizable voice command to clear message input.
‚Ä¢ Automatic detection of the language of response messages for text-to-speech voice.
‚Ä¢ Adds read aloud or listen button for each message for listening messages again.
‚Ä¢ Highlights the sentence or phrase you're currently listening to. Which helps improve understanding and comprehension.
‚Ä¢ Easily customizable keyboard shortcuts.
‚Ä¢ Real-time answers and conversations.
‚Ä¢ Seamless voice interface integration, voice chat, and voice typing.

With this extension, you can use your voice to:
‚Ä¢ Talk to Bard using your microphone in over 145 languages!
‚Ä¢ Ask questions and hear responses from Bard with a natural voice.
‚Ä¢ Use customizable voice commands to send messages and more.

Perfect for users tired of typing out queries and responses to the AI. Plus, you can also use this read-aloud feature to hear the AI's responses read back to you in a clear and natural voice. This feature is perfect for users who prefer to listen instead of read, or who want to learn new languages by listening to AI's responses in different tongues.

This extension is easy to install and use, and it works seamlessly with the AI's existing features. Simply install the extension, turn on the microphone, and start chatting with the AI like never before! Voice control (voice recognition) is available in more than 145 languages including English, Spanish, Mandarin Chinese, Russian, Hindi, Bengali, and more.
